english.segment1: I never thought I'd be the one to fool you, if I told you now it would be over (it's over), to steal all we had, be a part of all I've been without. all I've been without
english.segment2: We stop waiting and I start going home. You don't have to follow. You don't have to follow. Take this call as a hint we're moving on. You don't have to follow. You don't have to follow
english.segment3: I never got a single thing that I wanted. I never got a single thing that I wanted. I never spoke a single word that you told me. I never spoke a single word that you told me. You told me
english.segment4: We stop waiting and I start going home. You don't have to follow. You don't have to follow. Take this call as a hint we're moving on. You don't have to follow. You don't have to follow
english.segment5: This conversation, information that you wanted me to share. but I didn't want to be there. so I'll grant you one wish that won't come true
english.segment6: we stop waiting (we stop waiting, take this call). You don't have to follow. You don't have to follow. We're leaving you, we're leaving. You don't have to follow. You don't have to follow. We stop waiting and I start going home. You don't have to follow. You don't have to follow. Take this call as a hint we're moving on. You don't have to follow. You don't have to follow
